Table 1. Image classification top-1 error (%) on CIFAR-10/100 
and TI (TinyImagenet). Top-1 error (%): lower is better. Blue: 
second best. R: PreActResnet, W: WRN.  * : reported by [31].

Table 2. Image classification top-1 error (%) and computational 
analysis on ImageNet using Resnet-50 for 300 epochs. Lower is 
better. Blue: second best.  * : reported by authors;  ? : reported by 
PuzzleMix.

Table 3. Robustness to FGSM & PGD attacks. Top-1 error (%): lower is better. Blue: second best. Gain: reduction of error. TI: 
TinyImagenet. R: PreActResnet, W: WRN.

Table 4. Out-of-distribution detection using PreActResnet18. Det Acc (detection accuracy), AuROC, AuPR (ID) and AuPR (OOD): higher 
is better; Blue: second best. Gain: increase in performance. TI: TinyImagenet. Additional results are in the supplementary material.

Table 5. Weakly-supervised object localization on CUB200-2011. 
Top-1 loc.: Top-1 localization accuracy (%), MaxBoxAcc-v2: 
Maximal box accuracy

Table 6. Ablations using R-18 on CIFAR-100. Top-1 classification 
accuracy (%): higher is better. Arch: autoencoder architecture. 
AE: vanilla; VAE: variational [33].

Table 9. Calibration using PreActResnet18 on CIFAR-100. 
ECE: expected calibration error; OE: overconfidence error. Lower 
is better. Blue: second best. Gain: reduction of error.

Table 10. Ablation of the number of iterations in Sinkhorn-Knopp 
algorithm using R-18 on CIFAR-100. Top-1 classification accu-
racy(%): higher is better.
